rows.label: qst104906_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh... For a handsome gentleman,
even the sweat of battle
sparkles like a jewel...!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0002
rows.name: My apologies. I got carried away...

rows.label: qst104906_msg0003
rows.name:
Please tell me in detail about when
you defeated the Jairo Leopard!!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0022
rows.name:
We defeated the enemy with
Rex and Meleph's attacks.

rows.label: qst104906_msg0023
rows.name:
The flame of Rex and Meleph's
friendship defeated the enemy.

rows.label: qst104906_msg0041
rows.name: A heated battle! ...Is that how it was?

rows.label: qst104906_msg0051
rows.name:
Hmm hmm hmm! Oh ho ho! I
see, I see! It must have
been a beautiful flame!!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0063
rows.name:
I would like you to retrieve the
legendary ring that I dropped from
the top of the Amphoret Pillar.

rows.label: qst104906_msg0064
rows.name:
Ah! Even though it's legendary, it's
just a cheap one I prepared for my
research, so please don't worry.

rows.label: qst104906_msg0065
rows.name:
I want to include in my book the
scene of a handsome gentleman
obtaining a beautiful ring!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0066
rows.name:
This time, please tell me in
detail how you handled the
ring when you picked it up~

rows.label: qst104906_msg0101
rows.name:
Haa... I see... I'll be awaiting a
report from the handsome gentleman~

rows.label: qst104906_msg0201
rows.name:
Handsome gentleman... Please
remember how you obtain the ring.

rows.label: qst104906_msg0202
rows.name:
I will be writing furiously,
using your words as a reference!

rows.label: qst104906_msg0301
rows.name:
I'd prefer it if a handsome gentleman
obtained the legendary ring...

rows.label: qst104906_msg0302
rows.name:
It's fine if someone else picks
it up, but please have a handsome
gentleman narrate the scene~
